name: I Want My Diploma
description:
Climb your way to success! 

I Want My Diploma is the unofficial sequel of the kid of I Want My Mommy, now a fully grown-up college student, who seeks to obtain their diploma with good grades and good health!

=====================================================

Features

  • Build your future!
    • Look for the brown points to build ladders of books to climb between platforms and make your way to the top to grab the diploma.
  • Watch out for the bad grades and those pesky bugs!
    • Bad grades and bugs are obstacles that are always on the loose moving in the ground, avoid them by climbing and waiting until they are gone.
  • Always get a good sleep!
    • Pillows will appear every certain time, grab them to increase your health.

=====================================================

Controls

  • A and D to move the player left and right.
  • W to climb stairs.
  • Spacebar to build stairs.

=====================================================
